verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* that \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w*; \w as|strong="G5037"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simeon|strong="G4826"\w* that was \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Niger|strong="G3526"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lucius|strong="G3066"\w* of \w Cyrene|strong="G2956"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w Manaen|strong="G3127"\w*, which had been brought up \w with|strong="G4939"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* the \w tetrarch|strong="G5076"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*.

\w As|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w ministered|strong="G3008"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fasted|strong="G3522"\w*, the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Separate|strong="G0873"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w whereunto|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G5119"\w* they had \w fasted|strong="G3522"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w sent|strong="G0630"\w* \add them\add* \w away|strong="G0630"\w*.

¶ \w So|strong="G3303"\w* \w they|strong="G3778"\w*, being sent \w forth|strong="G1599"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w departed|strong="G2718"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Seleucia|strong="G4581"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* from \w thence|strong="G1564"\w* they \w sailed|strong="G0636"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2954"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Salamis|strong="G4529"\w*, they \w preached|strong="G2605"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* John \w to|strong="G2491"\w* \add their\add* \w minister|strong="G5257"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they had gone \w through|strong="G1330"\w* the \w isle|strong="G3520"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* \w Paphos|strong="G3974"\w*, they \w found|strong="G2147"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w sorcerer|strong="G3097"\w*, a false \w prophet|strong="G5578"\w*, a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \add was\add* \w Bar-jesus|strong="G0919"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the deputy of the \w country|strong="G0446"\w*, \w Sergius|strong="G4588"\w* \w Paulus|strong="G3972"\w*, a \w prudent|strong="G4908"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*; \w who|strong="G3778"\w* called \w for|strong="G4341"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*, and \w desired|strong="G1934"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Elymas|strong="G1681"\w* the \w sorcerer|strong="G3097"\w* (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w is|strong="G3177"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* by \w interpretation|strong="G3177"\w*) \w withstood|strong="G0436"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* to turn \w away|strong="G1294"\w* the \w deputy|strong="G0446"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*, (\w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add is called\add* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*,) filled \w with|strong="G4130"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, set his \w eyes|strong="G0816"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

And \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w subtilty|strong="G1388"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w mischief|strong="G4468"\w*, \add thou\add* \w child|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \add thou\add* \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, wilt \w thou|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w cease|strong="G3973"\w* to \w pervert|strong="G1294"\w* the \w right|strong="G2117"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seeing|strong="G0991"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w for|strong="G0891"\w* a \w season|strong="G2540"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w immediately|strong="G3916"\w* there \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w mist|strong="G0887"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w about|strong="G4013"\w* \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* some to lead him by the \w hand|strong="G5497"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the \w deputy|strong="G0446"\w*, when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* what was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*, \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, being \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* and his \w company|strong="G4012"\w* \w loosed|strong="G0321"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Paphos|strong="G3974"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Perga|strong="G4011"\w* in \w Pamphylia|strong="G3828"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w departing|strong="G0672"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

¶ But \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w departed|strong="G1330"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Perga|strong="G4011"\w*, they \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w* in \w Pisidia|strong="G4099"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, and sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w reading|strong="G0320"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* the rulers of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \add Ye\add* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2076"\w* any \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, say \w on|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* stood \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* beckoning \w with|strong="G2678"\w* \add his\add* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye that \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, give \w audience|strong="G0191"\w*.

The \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w chose|strong="G1586"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exalted|strong="G5312"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* they dwelt as \w strangers|strong="G3940"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* an \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w arm|strong="G1023"\w* brought \w he|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* of forty \w years|strong="G5063"\w* suffered \w he|strong="G5159"\w* their \w manners|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w destroyed|strong="G2507"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Chanaan|strong="G5477"\w*, he \w divided|strong="G2624"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* by \w lot|strong="G2624"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* he \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \add unto them\add* \w judges|strong="G2923"\w* about the space \w of|strong="G5613"\w* four \w hundred|strong="G5071"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fifty|strong="G4004"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w Samuel|strong="G4545"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.

And \w afterward|strong="G2547"\w* they \w desired|strong="G0154"\w* a \w king|strong="G0935"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4549"\w* the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Cis|strong="G2797"\w*, a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="G0958"\w*, by the space of \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w removed|strong="G3179"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* to \w be|strong="G1519"\w* their \w king|strong="G0935"\w*; to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he gave \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I have \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add son\add* of \w Jesse|strong="G2421"\w*, a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* mine \w own|strong="G3450"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w fulfil|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G0575"\w* this \w man’s|strong="G5127"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w hath|strong="G1453"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \add his\add* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* a \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w When|strong="G4296"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* had first \w preached|strong="G4296"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G1529"\w* the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* of \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* his \w course|strong="G1408"\w*, he \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Whom|strong="G5101"\w* think ye \w that|strong="G5282"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w am|strong="G1511"\w*? \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add he\add*. \w But|strong="G0235"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there cometh \w one|strong="G2064"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w shoes|strong="G5266"\w* \w of|strong="G4228"\w* \add his\add* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* to \w loose|strong="G3089"\w*.

\w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w stock|strong="G1085"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G3588"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w feareth|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w is|strong="G0649"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w*, because they \w knew|strong="G0050"\w* \w him|strong="G5126"\w* \w not|strong="G0050"\w*, nor \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voices|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*, they have \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \add them\add* in \w condemning|strong="G2919"\w* \add him\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* though they \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \add in him\add*, yet desired \w they|strong="G0154"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* should be \w slain|strong="G0337"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* they had \w fulfilled|strong="G5055"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* that was \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w took|strong="G2507"\w* \add him\add* \w down|strong="G2507"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w tree|strong="G3586"\w*, and \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \add him\add* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* a \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*:

\w And|strong="G3739"\w* he was \w seen|strong="G3700"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of them which came up \w with|strong="G4872"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w declare|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5209"\w* glad \w tidings|strong="G2097"\w*, how that the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* which was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*,

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w fulfilled|strong="G1603"\w* the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, in that he hath raised \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w again|strong="G0450"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* it \w is|strong="G1125"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w psalm|strong="G5568"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w have|strong="G1080"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w begotten|strong="G1080"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as concerning \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w raised|strong="G0450"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \add now\add* no \w more|strong="G3371"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w return|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w corruption|strong="G1312"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2046"\w* on this \w wise|strong="G3779"\w*, I will \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w sure|strong="G4103"\w* \w mercies|strong="G3741"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \add psalm\add*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G1325"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w suffer|strong="G1325"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* Holy \w One|strong="G3741"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w corruption|strong="G1312"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, after he had \w served|strong="G5256"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w generation|strong="G1074"\w* by the \w will|strong="G1012"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, fell on \w sleep|strong="G2837"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w laid|strong="G4369"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w corruption|strong="G1312"\w*:
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* raised \w again|strong="G1453"\w*, \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w corruption|strong="G1312"\w*.

¶ Be \w it|strong="G2077"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* this \w man|strong="G5127"\w* is \w preached|strong="G2605"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w forgiveness|strong="G0859"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G5129"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* are \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, from \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*.
